Pre-Game Insights: Analysts predicted a close game between Pakistan and England in the final of the T20 World Cup 2022
Others: Pakistan defeated New Zealand in the 1st semi-final to cruise through to the finals of the T20 World Cup 2022
Babar and Rizwan smacked half-centuries as the openers added 105 runs for the opening wicket
Shaheen Afridi returned with a figure of 3/14 in 3 overs against South Africa
Shaheen Afridi picked up the wickets of Finn Allen & captain Kane Williamson in the sem-final
Shaheen Afridi has taken 10 wickets in this tournament so far
Shadab Khan has also grabbed 10 wickets
Mohammad Haris has impressed in the last 3 matches and has smacked 89 runs at a strike rate of 161.81
Iftikhar Ahmed is the only other batter to cross the 100-run mark for Pakistan and has scored 114 runs in 6 innings
England registered an emphatic 10-wicket win in the 2nd semi-final against India while chasing a target of 169 runs
Alex Hales is having a dream comeback as he smacked 86 runs off 47 balls with 4 fours & 7 sixes and was adjudged the player of the match
Sam Curran has been the best bowler for England with 10 wickets to his name
England received a big blow as Mark Wood didn't play in the semi-finals against India, and has 9 wickets in 4 matches in this World Cup
Chris Jordan, who was included in place of Mark Wood against India, managed three wickets in his first outing in this World Cup
Adil Rashid has maintained the best economy amongst all English bowlers (6.25) and has helped in stopping the flow of runs in the middle overs
Ben Stokes (6.40) has the best economy in the team after Rashid and has registered 5 wickets in 5 matches
